page.title: 06The changing face of Penrith
page.content: There are plenty of interesting old buildings including a 14th Century castle for visitors to explore, but the face of Penrith is changing. the old court yards with their narrow enterances for easy defence during the borer raids are disappearing, as more shops and office open in the town. In spite of this enrith still keeps its characte but the people of the town are concerned as to what will happen next. big projects are being discussed amongst the planners and the people of the town. Two new shopping precients are under discussion, but the development, if it happens, will take place behind the existing facade of present buildings. The feelings about this are mixed, but some people think that it is about time Penrith advanced into the 20th Century.
